description:
This app is developed by "HOME'S" which is one of the biggest real estate 
portal sites in Japan. 

You can search for real estate properties both for rent and sale with a 
smooth interaction. 
You can freely set conditions like train lines, stations, cities, or 
even distance from the point where you are by GPS. 

Additionally, this app gives you information about average 
market price of each room types of each stations near by you. 
With this functionality, you can check average monthly price of 
properties in a city where you often go shopping, or a city near by your 
office, for example. You can save pictures you visit and even leave notes for each picture. (iPhone Only)

This app is powered by our huge database, the biggest one in Japan. 


:: Functionalities :: 

With this app, you can 
- Search for apartments, condominiums and houses for both rent and sale, as well as newly-built condominiums, newly-built houses for sale. 
- check average monthly price for renting a room nearby you (iPhone only). 
- call realtors by toll-free number 
- search by train lines, cities and distance from where you are. 
- check location of a realtor or a property on a map. 
- stock favorite properties in a list. 
- stock several search conditions, and easily re-search by them. 
- view route for a realtor location by launching map application. 
- tweet property info or average price info on Twitter directly. 
- Save pictures of homes you visit and leave mote for each, automatically organized pictures by homes. (turn on GPS, iPhone Only) 

We are planning to update constantly. Please keep on watching. 

:: Notes :: 

Properties are only in Japan, so that you can contact realtors in Japanese only. 

:: About HOME'S :: 

"HOME'S" is a real estate and housing portal site, with databases of over 4 million properties in Japan. 
You can contact realtors through "HOME'S" about any properties you like. 
We are providing variety of services relating to switching houses, from 
searching information around stations, cities, to contracting, moving.
